ygData.subject: Re: Koalindl Fishing  No truth to rumor you can fish for it.
ygData.msgSnippet: I had heard a rumor that you can fish for an extended period of time & get a Koalindl fish.  Just wanted to let everyone know I tested this.  After catching
ygData.messageBody:
I had heard a rumor that you can fish for an extended period of time & get a
Koalindl fish. Just wanted to let everyone know I tested this. After catching
about 80 fish & assorted daggers & old shoe, I DID NOT catch a Koalindl fish.

Also I was not killed by the Paladin (thought he was not fond of me), but by a
militia Corporal, after I did kill the fish.
